data.title: Absolute
data.text:
Established in 1998, Absolute Label Services is the label services business with a proven track record.

We offer fully managed services from digital and physical sales/distribution, to cutting edge marketing, to direct-to-consumer campaigns, promotional planning and all your administration needs. Our in-house marketing team will work in tandem with you to create and implement a bespoke campaign for budgets and releases of all sizes and genres across all platforms globally.

“Absolute Label Services was a key partner in making McFly’s independent ‘Radioactive’ campaign a big success. We worked with them at every step and it would have been hard to do it without them!”

McFly Managment CCO - AWAL

“As Germany’s biggest independent label, having Absolute Label Services as our partner has allowed us to successfully grow and develop our business in the UK.”

Edel/Ear Music General Manager - Ear Music/Edel

“I can strongly recommend them as part of any team for any album campaign Absolute Label Services were there every step of the way to help, support and advise from the most banal to urgent questions. In the face of a changing industry, Absolute are changing with the times, and their flexibility, expertise and professionalism makes them a real joy to work with. The teams are super professional and knowledgeable in their areas and I really enjoy working with them.”

Mondo Management – David Gray, Orbital, Damien Rice CEO - AIM

“Absolute have been a major part of the success of AATW since we started. With their help, guidance, ability, knowledge and care we have been able to concentrate on the creative aspects of our releases, leaving them to look after the rest. – Great team players.”

Cris Nuttall – (COO) AATW Records

“As long term supporters of AIM, we are big fans of the guys and girls over there.”

Alison Wenham – (CEO) AIM

“As Germany’s biggest independent label, having Absolute Label Services as our partner has allowed us to successfully grow and develop our business in the UK.”

Edel / earMusic

“Absolute Label Services was a key partner in making McFly’s independent ‘Radioactive’ campaign a big success. We worked with them at every step and it would have been hard to do it without them!”

McFly Managment

“We have worked with Absolute on Beverley’s last two albums and their understanding of the changing market place and ability to deliver has been a major factor in the success we have achieved.”

Dave Woolf – Beverley Knight Management

“Absolute have always gone beyond the call of duty to make sure our releases get the best possible attention – I can’t recommend them highly enough.“

Tim Clarke – IE Management (Robbie Williams, Passenger)

“ Absolute – the complete package, from managing and helping to fund the inception of a project all the way to it reaching the public – they will find the way to market – Excellent team.”

Nigel Templeman – Dexys

“Absolute’s level of service and support has been instrumental in Crystal Fighters development – their extensive label knowledge combined with back end analytics have provided invaluable support.”

Richard Austen Smith – Giant Men Management

“We’ve been working with Absolute for a good while now and have found their label services and all round approach to be second to none.“

Leon Alexander – Red Light Management
